description.text:
So you have some skill with a sword...that's nice and all, but do you have wits!
To prove you worthy of being my servant and protector, you should...
$(b;spring)gift$() me....a $(b;summer)bee's nest$()! Preferably with the bees stil inside! Yes!
We require more steeds for our cavalry... 
The Queen will be pleased with my offering! 
Be it the bees or this mortal's corpse....-the pixie giggles- uh cough cough!
Ow you still here! Now hop along and don't get stung!

That was amazing! Hope those stingers didn't hurt to much?
Or is that your normal face?
If that's the case, maybe you where better off getting stung...

These will be perfect offerings for our Queen, $(b;summer)Titania$(). 
We're always in need of Bee steeds for our Knights. Ill present our offering to her now!

$(b;summer)-The Queen was pleased with the offering and reward you with the protection of her royal bees-$()
